tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I recently underwent a left leg knee replacement surgery performed by Dr. Prabath Lakkireddi. The procedure was conducted using advanced robotic-assisted technology, ensuring exceptional precision and accuracy. Dr. Lakkireddi demonstrated outstanding expertise in orthopedic surgery, meticulously aligning the prosthetic components with my anatomical structure. His attention to detail and use of cutting-edge technology resulted in an optimal postoperative outcome, significantly improving my knee function and mobility. I am extremely satisfied with the care and professionalism exhibited by Dr. Lakkireddi and his team, and I highly recommend him for anyone considering knee replacement surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ** ***** **** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** I had visited various doctors for my knee issues but inspite of me doing everything the other doctors had recommended my knee never recovered. I had heard about Prabhat sir from a colleague of mine and visited. The doc had recommended to get a couple of tests done part which he had recommended me to get a meniscus surgery done for a permanent fix. The doc never hurried and tried to give me more time, explained the crux of the issue and even sent me a few videos for me to understand and mentally prepare myself. He was extremely professional during surgery right from his patience in explaining the issue in detail both to family and me before surgery n after surgery to his care for his patients makes him stand out. While it was supposed to be a meniscus surgery once he started the scopy and realized that my ACL was damaged as well, explained the issue to my family showed photos and took their consent to fix that as well since it was the root cause of the meniscus injury n a better permanent fix. I really liked his honesty here as he could have simple gone ahead with meniscus repair as planned but his genuine intent of fixing the knee for good and suggesting whats the right thing to do for patients is appreciable. The time he gives to patients even during appointments is noteworthy. If you are looking for an ortho look no further. He has a really good support team as well Venkat who manages appointments n paperwork, Krishna one of the physio under him are very professional and good at what they do. Thanks Prabhat sir n team for a successful surgery I was able to walk with a walker the next day after surgery n without walker in a few days with a ROM support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Doctor for ACL reconstruction and meniscus surgery.
I had torn ACL and visited few Doctors for ACL reconstruction surgery. Did online research and with reference from distant friends, met Dr. Prabhat. After carefully listening to the problem and the surgical procedure, finally decided to go with Dr. Prabhat. He explained  everything for all my questions (some very silly questions as well), and got confidence after meeting and talking to him.  My observations are - he is very patient, friendly and care for patients.  

After all the  pre-tests and formalities and insurance approvals, I got my surgery done on  22nd Apr 2019.  I was able to walk with the support of walker immediately the next day and discharged on the same day. Met the doctor again on 10 May 2019 for stitches removal.  I went to meet Dr for consultation by walking with knee brace support from hospital entrance. 
I started walking without walker and brace immediately after few days from then. For Physiotherapy I used the 3rd party services initaially. When I met next time after a month for consultation, he is not happy with the progress and suggested me to take help from the Physio who works for him and gave his improvement suggestions to Physio.
Next time when i met after 2 months, The doctor was very happy upon seeing my progress. Its almost 9 months since surgrey done and didnt face any issues. 

Venkat who is support staff, was very helpful for all the appointments and scheduling my surgery. Rohit, Phsio, did my physiotherapy and helped me to recover fast!

I strongly suggest Dr. Prabhat for all ACL surgeries and consultation!

Thank you Dr!
Rajesh
reply_text:
Thank you to know that you had a
HAPPY KNEE. In the view of negative feedback given by one of my patients parent two months back, I wish to discuss about MONEY AND ETHICS IN MEDICAL PRACTICE. And DETERIORATING OPINION ON DOCTORS.
I see an average 30-40patients a day which around 6000/year. If 8 out of 6000 give me a negative feedback, I don’t worry as mostly are about delays in clinic which are beyond my control during an emergency case. But even if one patient comments about about my MEDICAL ETHICS, that hurts me and make me look into my inner conscious and question myself “am I the unethical person the lady is taking about.” 
I will give an example of how PATIENTS INTERPRET DECISION MAKING.
I saw a 12year old child with knee dislocation. Scan shows ligament tear which needs surgery. If you go for a second opinion, there is very fair chance the doctor won’t agree with surgical decision as we know that most patients coming second opinion don’t want surgery at that point. Does this mean that first date is unethical ? Of course I see on a daily basis where surgery was wrongly suggested when there is absolutely no indication. 
KNEE LIGAMENT INJURIES NEED SURGERY NOT TO IMPROVE PAIN, but to prevent any instability in future which when untreated leads to arthritis in joint over 5years. So if you treat a ACL TEAR  patient without surgery, he will walk again in properly in few weeks. That doesn’t mean surgery is not required at all.  Most  people slowly damage the joint because of knee jerking with every step and worse with running or playing sports. How do I make patient understand the long term issues. 
I operate some knee ligament injuries immediately after injury and some even 4-5 years after the ligament tear. The difference between those two cases  is the damage done to joint in patients who have delayed surgery. 
So QUESTIONING ETHICALITY OF A GOOD DOCTOR IS WRONG.  We study close to 30years to understand the intricacies in decision making. How can a person judge a doctor  based on information gathered in few minutes from google or from another doctor ? 
Please question yourself, before posting demoralising statements.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I sprained the lisfranc ligament in my foot. I went to Sunshine Hospital in Secunderabad as it was nearer to my place. There I received improper treatment and even after 6 weeks I had a lot of pain. Then I went to Dr. Prabhath Reddy in Apollo hospital after reading great reviews about him. There he immediately recognised that I had developed CRPS in my foot as a result of the improper treatment I had received at Sunshine Hospital. CRPS is a very painful and a rare disease only a very few skilled doctors could diagnose and treat, and Dr. Prabhath Reddy is one of them. He actively listens to your problems and prescribes the right treatment. He is very friendly and ** *** **** ********* ** *** ****** His diagnostic skills are truly amazing. I was in a great amount of pain when I first met him. But after his treatment my pain has significantly decreased and now I am able to walk a lot without any assistance. I am really happy with his treatment and I always curse myself for not coming to him in the first place.For any orthopaedic issue I sincerely recommend Dr. Prabhath Reddy to anyon

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Prabhat Reddy Lakkireddy is a very talented and a trustworthy orthopaedic surgeon at Apollo hospital, Jubilee hills, Hyderabad.
I got my right total knee replacement ( TKR) by Dr. Prabhat Reddy in the month of June. The pre operational process was thoroughly explained to us and we were guided for all the pre- op requirements in terms of various tests and X-rays.Dr. Prabhat Reddy and his entire team are very supportive and encouraging pre and post surgery.The best part is that the team is available on WhatsApp group and we can address any kind of query to which they answer as soon as possible ( usually within 1  to 2 hrs).
The surgery was conducted by Dr. Prabhat sir him self along with his team and he always has a very positive approach towards the patients querries and concerns.The physiotherapist was also recommended by him and the therapist was great with his exercise suggestions and follow up routine.The post operative followup meets with Dr. Prabhat were full of encouragement to continue with exercises for better results.He has a very calm and composed  approach towards the pateint and their families.
I highly recommend Dr.Prabhat Reddy for TKR surgery to whoever needs to be operated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am Vikas, aged 32. I had an accident due bike skid and fell on the road on my right side along with bike. Due to sudden twist of leg between road and bike, ACL tear happened. After reading through many positive reviews on Practo, I visited Apollo hospital Jubilee hills and consulted Dr. Prabhat Reddy sir for treatment. Being an experienced orthopaedics, he was able to quickly suggest the next steps for my scenario. My injury was complex in nature because of  meniscus tear and minor LCL tear as well along with complete ACL tear. Before visiting Prabhat Reddy sir, I had many doubts about my recovery due complex nature of ligament tears in knee but after consulting him, all my doubts were cleared and gave confidence that I can recover and walk again normally in 8-12 weeks. He clearly explained which ligaments will be treated during the arthroscopic surgery and which will be healed automatically. I am writing this review after 2 months, I am able walk normally (99%) now, And I am confident that by the completion of  3 months everything will be normal. Sir has group of talented physiotherapists, who does physio sessions at home as per our convenience. they follow the week-by-week guidelines set by Prabhat Reddy sir and make sure you are on track for full recovery. Overall, I had a very good treatment from Dr. Prabhat Reddy sir and his physio team. Thanks you sir for helping me recover from injury quickly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Prabhat Reddy Lakireddy is not only a great doctor a great human being as well. In a time when our world is so fast paced, we needed someone who will listen to our problem and respond appropriately. My father-in-law was suffering from knee pain form long time and consulted few doctors but his pain persisted. So when he visited Hyderabad we discussed with Dr B.G Ratnam and he suggested Prabhat sir's name. After the consultation with the doctor we were satisfied and for the first time my father-in-law thought that his treatment was going in right direction. Prabhat sir will take enough time to explain you the root cause and what you have to do next. My father-in-law went through knee replacement surgery on 5th May 2019 . And he was able to walk with support after 2 days. I am very happy to say that my father-in-law now recovered fully and able to do all the activities as before. We really recommend you to consult Dr. Prabhat Reddy Lakireddy if you have any pain or discomfort in musculoskeletal system (the bones, joints, ligaments, tendons, and muscles). We are sure that you will get correct consultation and remedy from him. We are really thankful to Dr.Prabhat Reddy Lakireddy and his subordinates.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Prabhat Lakkireddy sir and Dr. Bhimsetty lokesh sir really taken much care about my ACL surgery and they were help me emotionally.i felt very happy to say that I am getting speedy recovery by Doctors treatment and their persuasive words. Highly compassionate and helpful. Polite staff members and helping nature. Very higene Hospital.Thankyou Arete Hospitals

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ******* ********** ** *** **** ** ***** ** ****** ****** ********* ** *********.

I visited for my ACL knee injury as a second opinion by seeing positive reviews across different platforms.

After talking to doctor understood why there are so many positive reviews. He gives so much time to you and listens to you first and explains the situation clearly. 

I went ahead with All Inside Arthroscopic Surgery for ACL (Bilateral) and recovering successfully under the guidance of team of doctors.

Best part was, right after surgery finished dr. Prabhat went to my parents outside and informed details of how the procedure was.

Also, Dr. Lokesh and Dr. Kundan were helpful throughout. Post op support is also the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the most efficient and knowledgeable doctors I have ever met. Equally important is the fact he is a great human being with down to earth approach who is always eager to listen to patients and their guardians/wards patiently and explain to them every aspect of the disease till they are satisfied. He can spare any time out of his busy schedule to address patients and their guardians’ queries, questions and apprehensions with utmost calmness and composure. His team including Dr Lokesh and Dr Kundan and assistants, is very friendly, energetic and efficient too and also always available to address any issue related to the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Had great experience experience with Prabhat sir,
I had undergone arthroscopic surgery for shoulder, went great.
Prabhat sir is so kind and helpful in making me understand the problem, explained very clearly about my condition  and what exactly the surgery is for. Post surgery follow up and support from Prabhat sir and his team especially kundan sir, solanki sir, Mr. Venkatesh was great.
Doctors like Prabhat sir is rare to find who really takes very much care about patients.
I am very thankful to him.
And finally how can I forget to mention great hospitality of Apollo hospitals, Jubilee hills. Sisters in Apollo treated me as if they are treating their own brother.
Thanks a lot for them too..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My Brother had a ACL issue and meniscus tear, Before meeting DR prabhat reddy met couple of doctors literally they scared me about the meniscus ( removing meniscus ) but after meeting him he clearly explained the issue and Procedure  what he follows. 

My brother operation was completed on 23 DEC 2019, from next day with help of stand he can able to walk. After 2 weeks he was able to walk with any support and brace . *** *** *** ** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ***** ** ****** ***** *********** Thank you so much sir.
reply_text:
I am happy that your are doing well. But sometimes I wonder what makes people think I do unethical practice. Please read the negative feedback given by one of my patients parents that I had done taken a wrong decision and also insisted on having surgery after knowing that they have insurance. 
My rule of ethics which I strictly adhere-
1. Diagnose the condition
2. Given them treatment options
3. If surgery is the best option, then I wait for patient to ask me how much it cost for surgery
4. Only after patient understands surgery will help, then we ask them if they have pay for their treatment or insurance. 
Under no circumstance either me or my junior consultants or my staff should enquire about insurance. 
If I reach a stage where money will drive me, then I think I will certainly consider looking another job. I always believed and taught my juniors,” do the best for your patients, money will come”, in a span of 40years of medical practice , we all can make decent money, but that shouldn’t be the driving force. I was seeing the negative feedback after 2months, so I thought I should clarify on money and ethics.
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an ACL construction done in 2010 but it got loose after playing sports, I then met Dr Prabhat Lakkireddy sir, he explained the whole issue and ensured that the operation was done using advanced techniques including using Nylon based band for additional strength while reconstructing the ACL, I am now able to play badminton normally, also, sir completed the operation in one go instead of traditional two steps recommended by another popular surgeon, I am eternally grateful to Lakkireddy sir for doing such a fantasy job. I have since then recommended my brother in law as well as he also has given me great feedback, I trust him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Hello everyone 

I had a shoulder dislocation problem since for a long time i have consulted dr.Prabhat
he explained clearly about the possibilities of causing problem and suggested to have
ARTHROSCOPIC REMPLISSAGE surgery and it is successfully done by dr.Prabahat.
Not only treatment... the magnificent  way that he treats and cares about the patients
in a friendly manner and very responsible about patients is impressive.

I’d like to thank you for the excellent care and treatment I received from You.
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback. Nice to know some patient remember the medical terminology. 
I do a STANDARD ARTHROSCOPIC LABRAL
REPAIR for a recurrent shoulder dislocation.
For a patient who had a failed surgery or surgery not done properly, need an ADDITIONAL PROCEDURE CALLED REMPLISSAGE TO PREVENT FURTHER DISLOCATION. 
Though it is technically challenging, I have excellent results and patients are able to go back to sports in 6-9months. 
We believe adopting newer technology to treat most sports injuries with excellent results like SPEED BRIDGE SHOULDER CUFF REPAIR, TENDON GRAFTING FOR MASSIVE CUFF TEARS.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ******* ** * **** ****** ** *** ******* The doctor will be so much friendliness *** **** ********* *********** ***** and prescribe only right selection of drugs..  ******* ** *** ***** ******** ********* ** ******** ** ******* ** ****** ****** Sometimes doctors will get unexpected emergencies cases and should do surgeries. the timings will go out their controls. Be patience to wait.. Without patience u wont get successful in life.* ** * **** ****** ***** * **** ** **** ** ****** **** ** ******** Try to understand doctors pain always doing hardworking and no proper time to rest for them.. they should rush to hospitals at early morning hours only.. they have no proper time to spend with family members..  Mostly every companies will get leaves in weekneds and presently working at home and enjoying but doctors have time to enjoy.. even ventakesh secretary  should attend and answer each and every calls and sometimes they wont get proper signals communicating with doctors while in operating.. so please wait for online and offline consultations.. demanding and shouting of doctors and secretary should not acceptance..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is the one who should create a hope to ppl who comes to them. Create a positive environment make them feel free and should be able to listen to their patients. You can find all these qualities in Prabhat Sir. He gave me lot of time where he answered all of my questions with a smile. He explained everything clearly. Am 31 years old. Since 4 years I was suffering from knee pain. Visited few doctors they didn't explain my problem clearly. Visited other dr he suggested to have a arthroscopic surgery for both the knees but still my issue was not properly addressed. When I was collecting my mri reports I came to know about Prabhat Sir. So finally wanted to give a last try. I have just shown all my reports. He clearly explained me wts my issue. I have a problem with my meniscus in both the knees. Due to that am suffering from patello femoral joint osteoarthritis (pfjoa) in my right knee. He said a word don't worry as of now no need of surgery we will start the treatment which could solve your problem. Thank you Sir for your patience friendly behavior and suggestions

review: I am happy with the treatment given for my AVN problem, I could able to so my daily activities, the pain was gone now,  it's a regrow treatment taken by me as per doctor it slowly form a bone as per report seems it's getting improved from the day of surgery till now, Sooner expecting to resume the same pace life as before getting the AVN.. tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am a medical professional, unfortunately I met an accident in the heart of the city, a auto hit my bike from back side I fell down right side after controlling and I standup within a Seconds. After that I drive and went to office, after 2-3 hrs slowly pain increased in my right leg knee, I took X-ray & visit to the Dr.Brabhat Reddy lakkireddi, immediately he advised me to take MRI within 24hrs, I visited again with MRI report, Dr explained the situation and adviced for plaster and Bed rest for 6weeks, today also I visited again after 3weeks with fresh X-ray, Dr said after completing 6weeks plaster will remove. Overall I feel Dr is very polite and professionally High experienced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got my disc prolapse operated by Dr.Prabhat Kumar (and Rahul Lath, Neurosurgeon) from Apollo Hospitals, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad. He accurately assessed the urgency of the surgery, rightly warned us to avoid further delay in decision making by educating us about the ill-effects of a delayed decision. We got admitted for surgery. Dr.Prabhat showed great care, and concern about us (more so around this chaotic pandemic situation), and ensured we are well informed during every phase of the surgery. The specific operating procedure used (Micro-endo discectomy) was by orders less painful than Micro Discectomy that I had undergone a couple of years back in another premium Corporate hospital, for a similar problem. He promptly followed up and reviewed my post-surgery situation. My recovery has been quite +ve so far, and sincere thanks to Dr.Prabhat for being a great doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had visited doctor because of severe pain in my lower back. First of all the has doctor listened to me thoroughly and patiently. Checked my previous records and then asked me to get an MRI. After looking at my MRI he gave medication and advised to me perform physiotherapy. Medication was not heavy, just 2-3 tablets a day. I recovered in around 20-25 days, my pain got reduced. After one month I visited him for a review and he talked very patiently with me and explained me how I should change my lifestyle to avoid such issues in future. I strongly recommend Doctor Prabhat garu. Even though being a senior and famous doctor he is very humble and down to earth.

tags: Wait time,
review: I'm not sure who to hold responsible for my extremely unsatisfactory experience at the Maven clinic where my prior appointment with the doctor had been scheduled. I was at the venue before my scheduled time and was informed that the doctor is running late by 45mins. I patiently waited and was positive about the meeting (even though I was getting late for work) as I was really impressed by previous reviews. And then I was asked to wait for 15 more minutes and later again another 15 minutes. So after waiting for more than 1hr 15mins, I came back. The receptionists seemed equally misinformed and were of no help. It was a rather unprofessional behaviour from whosoever stands responsible for and hopefully booking slots are made available as per doctor's availablity in future. Prior information must be passed to patient in case of any changes in schedule.
